title: All assassin teams don't fucking work.
body: I am tired of pointing this out. The one in a million occurrence against an imbecilic team or watching a professional team pull it off doesn't suddenly make it the fucking gospel.

replies.body:
The only way it was an all assassin team is if you were also an assassin...

Also it might almost be OK if they all have dark harvest and focus their fire

1 Assassin teams don't work.


Replaced by every tanky motherfucekr.
